# Trixode Studios

## Summary
Trixode Studios is a software and AI studio building advanced infrastructure, research tools, and custom systems for science-driven teams. We focus on AI systems, scientific computing, data architecture, and cloud platforms.

## Services
- AI systems and agentic workflows
- Scientific computing and research tooling
- Data architecture and visualization
- Web and product development
